verses.verse: And <S%G1161>when<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> was come <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3735>mountain<s%>, <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2400>behold<s%>, there <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> a <S%G3015>leper<s%> and <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> thou <S%G2309>wilt<s%>, thou <S%G1410>canst<s%> <S%G2511>make<s%> me <S%G3165>clean<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>he<s%> stretched <S%G1614>forth<s%> his <S%G5495>hand<s%>, and <S%G680>touched<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, I <S%G2309>will<s%>; be thou made <S%G2511>clean<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2112>straightway<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3014>leprosy<s%> was <S%G2511>cleansed<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1525>when<s%> <S%G2424>he<s%> was <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2584>Capernaum<s%>, there <S%G4334>came<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> a <S%G1543>centurion<s%>, <S%G3870>beseeching<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3816>servant<s%> <S%G906>lieth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3614>house<s%> sick of the <S%G3885>palsy<s%>, <S%G1171>grievously<s%> <S%G928>tormented<s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>he<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> will come <S%G2064>and<s%> <S%G2323>heal<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G1543>centurion<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2425>worthy<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> thou shouldest <S%G1525>come<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4721>roof<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> say the <S%G3056>word<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3816>servant<s%> shall be <S%G2390>healed<s%>.

And <S%G1161>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G2296>it<s%>, he marvelled, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to them that <S%G190>followed<s%>, <S%G281>Verily<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, I <S%G2147>have<s%> <S%G3761>not<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> so <S%G5118>great<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>, <S%G3761>no<s%>, not <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2474>Israel<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> shall <S%G2240>come<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G395>east<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1424>west<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> shall sit <S%G347>down<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2464>Isaac<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2384>Jacob<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%>:

but <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> shall be cast <S%G1544>forth<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G1857>outer<s%> <S%G4655>darkness<s%>: <S%G1563>there<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> the <S%G2805>weeping<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1030>gnashing<s%> of <S%G3599>teeth<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto the <S%G1543>centurion<s%>, Go thy <S%G5217>way<s%>; <S%G5613>as<s%> thou hast <S%G4100>believed<s%>, so be it <S%G1096>done<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G846>the<s%> <S%G3816>servant<s%> was <S%G2390>healed<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G680>touched<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4446>fever<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G846>her<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> she <S%G1453>arose<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1247>ministered<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>.

And <S%G1161>when<s%> <S%G3798>even<s%> was <S%G1096>come<s%>, they <S%G4374>brought<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> possessed with <S%G1139>demons<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> he cast <S%G1544>out<s%> the <S%G4151>spirits<s%> <S%G3056>with<s%> a <S%G3056>word<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2323>healed<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that <S%G2192>were<s%> <S%G2560>sick<s%>:

that <S%G3704><s%> it might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> which was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>: <S%G846>Himself<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G769>infirmities<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G941>bare<s%> our <S%G3554>diseases<s%>.
